item.title: Making a Game Engine in Rust 01: Introduction
item.description: In this post, I introduce my new project. I discuss what game engines are, why I'm creating one, and outline the tools and approach I'll be using.

item.title: Making a Game Engine in Rust 03: ECS
item.description: This post covers the creation of a basic ECS for the game engine.

item.title: Making a Game Engine in Rust 02: First Steps
item.description: This post covers the initial setup for the Axle game engine, including project structure, rendering with SDL2, coordinate system adjustments, input handling, and the engine's new name.
